title: Amazon shares hit record on blockbuster earnings report
text:
Amazon shares hit record on blockbuster earnings report 6:20pm BST - 01:18
Shares of Amazon soared to a lifetime high Friday after the online giant announced a rate hike for its Prime service and blew through all earnings expectations, with profits more than doubling compared to the same period last year. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
